page.shortlink: api sys event log dump function
page.description: The SYS_EVENT_LOG_DUMP() function dumps events from the system event log. Dump events in event log - format S=string,C=computer,N=Name,T=time,W=Time written,K=Kind of event,E=eventid,X=subcategory.
page.syntax: OutputString as C = SYS_EVENT_LOG_DUMP(C Application,C format)

argument.name: format
argument.description:
The information to return. The format can include:
"S" = string
"C" = computer
"N" = name
"T" = time
"W" = time written
"K" = kind of event
"E" = event ID
"X" = subcategory

page.example: sys_event_log("Alpha Anywhere Application Server","I:The server has started")
